metadata.title: CVE-2019-6789 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before11.5.8, 11.6.x before 11.6.6, and 11.7.x before 11.7.1. It allowsInformation Disclosure (issue 4 of 6). In some cases, users without projectpermissions will receive emails after a project move. For private projects,this will disclose the new project namespace to an unauthorized user.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
